markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Secrets of the Coven](/Articles.aspx?ID=66)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 68</row>

Peer into the stew of secrets held by Golarion's [hags](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=59), including new ways to establish sinister covens and new abilities for hag covens to use against their foes!
name: Secrets of the Coven
